name: Anhangá Tingá
description:
The latest version of the game can be found here. The earlier version is very buggy, sorry :/

In Anhangá Tingá (which means "White Devil" in the Tupi Guarani language of Brazilian natives) the player controls Caipora, a mythological creature of Brazilian folklore. Exploring the Amazon rainforest, she must cause panic in the invaders' hearts, frightening them with her presence and sabotaging their mining and logging illegal camps, thus reducing the fear that the indigenous tribes feel for the harmful presence of villains.

= Control scheme =

- Move: WASD / Joypad

- Sabotage/Frighten: RMB / X - Jump: LMB / Y

= Goals =

- Sabotage equipment, traps and obstacles!

- Frighten the bad guys!

- Don’t allow the Panic Bar from the Indigenous tribes to grow!
